statements: DELETE FROM intersections WHERE city = 'New York' AND wait_time_minutes > 10;
DELETE FROM intersections WHERE intersection_id = 1 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM wait_times WHERE wait_time > 30 AND date_time < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM TrafficData WHERE intersection_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TrafficSignals WHERE signal_type = 'Pedestrian' AND signal_status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_id IN (SELECT signal_id FROM traffic_signals WHERE intersection_id = 2001)
